hindi:
साईं इतना दीजिए, जा में कुटुंब समाय।
मैं भी भूखा न रहूं, साधु न भूखा जाय।
english:
Sai itna dijiye, ja mein kutumb samay.
Main bhi bhukha na rahun, sadhu na bhukha jay.
translation: Lord, give me just enough that my family can survive. Neither I should remain hungry, nor should any saint go hungry.
